import { DayWrapper } from './style.js' function DayWeatherCard ({maxTemperature, minTemperature, cityName, icon, description, country}) { return( <>

{cityName} , {country}

{description}

22 °C

min: {minTemperature.toFixed(0)} °C

max: {maxTemperature.toFixed(0)} °C

 ) } export default DayWeatherCard
